intro.name: Daniel Pipkin.
intro.main: I'm a software developer living in Raleigh, NC specializing in building beautiful websites and turning complex problems into creative and intuitive solutions.

body: I'm Daniel, a software engineer based in Raleigh, NC

I enjoy creating things that live on the internet, whether that be websites, applications, or anything in between. My goal is to always build products that provide pixel-perfect, performant experiences.
Here are a few technologies I've been working with recently:

cards.title: Aveva maturity assessment
cards.description: An Asset Performance Strategy Assessment using Gatsby, SASS, and Hubspot API.

cards.title: IBM i 30th Anniversary
cards.description: Dynamic Microsite celebrating 30 years of innovation using JQuery, HandleBars, IBMv19, and SASS.

cards.title: IBM Sterling OM benefits calculator
cards.description: Benefits calculator estimating how IBM Sterling Order Management can help your bottom line using Gatsby and Carbon Design components.

cards.title: Ping Identity Assessment
cards.description: Cross-currency assessment identifying security threats using JQuery and SASS.

cards.title: The Green Chair Project
cards.description: Custom Wordpress template created for a Raleigh based charity donating home furnishings to those in need.

cards.title: IBM Sterling anomoly detection interactive
cards.description: Interactive game for IBM Sterling Order Management using JQuery, SASS, and IBM V19 digital design standards.
